Class main.VirusGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.VirusGroup

  • class main.VirusGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    main.VirusGroup that holds its own viruses, it receives commands from the manager and then delegates them to the viruses

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<main.Virus> viruses
      Array List holding all the viruses

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      main.VirusGroup(main.Virus v)
      creates a virus group
      main.VirusGroup(main.Virus[] toAdd)
      overloaded constructor, has a array list of viruses to add and assigns a group number typically called when splitting groups
